progress bar¶

Temporarily out of use.

class DataViewer.progressbar.BusyBar(text='')[source]¶

Adapted from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8007602/ looping-qprogressbar-gives-error-qobjectinstalleventfilter-cannot-filter-e

Looping progress bar create the signal that the thread will emit

Note

This function creates a busy bar but I have not figured out how to attach it to a process. Therefore, it is currently functionally useless.
